title: Is a high dose of weed similar to a shroom trip?
description: Answer (1 of 3): Experience-wise, no. My interpretation of the differences: cannabis is a very earthly substance. It has coevolved as a companion plant to humans for eons and compliments the human experience in so many different ways, as a medicine, food, fuel source, recreation, spiritual aid...a ...
